case_title: Messrs Shaheen Foundation (PAF) vs Commissioner-II, SRB, Karachi

key_issues.input_tax_dispute: Admissibility of input tax claimed on vehicles and related expenses

legal_provisions.primary_statute: Sindh Sales Tax on Services Act, 2011

issues: No notice provided to cure defects
Decision signed by unauthorized staff officer

instructions: Proper filing of revision application with necessary documents
Right of hearing to be provided
Decision to be made on merits

additional_comments.training_needed: Quasi-judicial officers require proper training on legal principles
additional_comments.discrimination_claim: Appellant alleged unequal treatment compared to National Bank of Pakistan

actions_requested.copy_to_chairman: Order to be sent to Chairman SRB for review and necessary action
actions_requested.progress_update: Tribunal expects updates on the matter from SRB
